languages.text: Измученные солдаты с радостью восприняли возможность отдохнуть. Бдительные часовые заступили в дозор, пока их более удачливые товарищи набивают брюхо промороженными пайками исчезнувшего экипажа.
The bone-weary soldiers welcome the chance to rest. Watchful sentries stand guard while their more fortunate comrades stuff themselves with the now-frozen rations of the ship's vanished crew.
languages.original_text: Измученные солдаты с радостью восприняли возможность отдохнуть. Бдительные часовые заступили в дозор, пока их более удачливые товарищи набивают брюхо промороженными пайками исчезнувшего экипажа.

traits.locale_text: The bone-weary soldiers welcome the chance to rest. Watchful sentries stand guard while their more fortunate comrades stuff themselves with the now-frozen rations of the ship's vanished crew.
The bone-weary soldiers welcome the chance to rest. Watchful sentries stand guard while their more fortunate comrades stuff themselves with the now-frozen rations of the ship's vanished crew.
The bone-weary soldiers welcome the chance to rest. Watchful sentries stand guard while their more fortunate comrades stuff themselves with the now-frozen rations of the ship's vanished crew.
The bone-weary soldiers welcome the chance to rest. Watchful sentries stand guard while their more fortunate comrades stuff themselves with the now-frozen rations of the ship's vanished crew.

languages.text: 疲惫不堪的士兵们终于得到了休息的机会。警惕的哨兵负责站岗放哨，而他们的同伴负责搜索飞船。探险队幸运地在船上找到了已经冻硬的口粮，用这些食物填饱了肚子。
languages.original_text: The bone-weary soldiers welcome the chance to rest. Watchful sentries stand guard while their more fortunate comrades stuff themselves with the now-frozen rations of the ship's vanished crew.

traits.locale_text: 疲惫不堪的士兵们终于得到了休息的机会。警惕的哨兵负责站岗放哨，而他们的同伴负责搜索飞船。探险队幸运地在船上找到了已经冻硬的口粮，用这些食物填饱了肚子。

languages.text: 疲れ切った兵士は休息の機会を歓迎する。歩哨兵が用心深く警戒する間、運に恵まれた仲間たちは乗務員が消えた船にある凍った配給食料をほおばる。
languages.original_text: The bone-weary soldiers welcome the chance to rest. Watchful sentries stand guard while their more fortunate comrades stuff themselves with the now-frozen rations of the ship's vanished crew.

traits.locale_text: 疲れ切った兵士は休息の機会を歓迎する。歩哨兵が用心深く警戒する間、運に恵まれた仲間たちは乗務員が消えた船にある凍った配給食料をほおばる。

languages.text: Los exhaustos soldados agradecen la oportunidad de descansar. Los guardias vigilan mientras que sus compañeros, más afortunados, se atiborran de las raciones congeladas de la tripulación desaparecida.
languages.original_text: The bone-weary soldiers welcome the chance to rest. Watchful sentries stand guard while their more fortunate comrades stuff themselves with the now-frozen rations of the ship's vanished crew.

traits.locale_text: Los exhaustos soldados agradecen la oportunidad de descansar. Los guardias vigilan mientras que sus compañeros, más afortunados, se atiborran de las raciones congeladas de la tripulación desaparecida.

languages.text: Les soldats épuisés se réjouissent d'avoir enfin une occasion de se reposer. Des sentinelles vigilantes montent la garde pendant que leurs camarades plus chanceux s'empiffrent de rations gelées prélevées dans les réserves de l'équipage disparu.
languages.original_text: The bone-weary soldiers welcome the chance to rest. Watchful sentries stand guard while their more fortunate comrades stuff themselves with the now-frozen rations of the ship's vanished crew.

traits.locale_text: Les soldats épuisés se réjouissent d'avoir enfin une occasion de se reposer. Des sentinelles vigilantes montent la garde pendant que leurs camarades plus chanceux s'empiffrent de rations gelées prélevées dans les réserves de l'équipage disparu.

languages.text: Die völlig erschöpften Soldaten begrüßen die Gelegenheit, sich auszuruhen. Wachen werden eingeteilt, während ihre Kameraden mit etwas mehr Glück die mittlerweile gefrorenen Rationen der verschwundenen Crew des Schiffs zu sich nehmen.
languages.original_text: The bone-weary soldiers welcome the chance to rest. Watchful sentries stand guard while their more fortunate comrades stuff themselves with the now-frozen rations of the ship's vanished crew.

traits.locale_text: Die völlig erschöpften Soldaten begrüßen die Gelegenheit, sich auszuruhen. Wachen werden eingeteilt, während ihre Kameraden mit etwas mehr Glück die mittlerweile gefrorenen Rationen der verschwundenen Crew des Schiffs zu sich nehmen.

languages.text: Bitkin askerler dinlenme şansını kaçırmadılar. Şanslı yoldaşları geminin ortadan kaybolan tayfasından kalan donmuş rasyonları yerken gözcüler nöbet tuttu.
languages.original_text: The bone-weary soldiers welcome the chance to rest. Watchful sentries stand guard while their more fortunate comrades stuff themselves with the now-frozen rations of the ship's vanished crew.

traits.locale_text: Bitkin askerler dinlenme şansını kaçırmadılar. Şanslı yoldaşları geminin ortadan kaybolan tayfasından kalan donmuş rasyonları yerken gözcüler nöbet tuttu.
